overview: Whoa, nelly! You better come and check this out, because it's a special collector's edition featuring six of the hottest scenes with the sexiest teen queen in the biz Rebeca Linares. She's got that slender body and a tight little cunt to make you go all night long. And if that wasn't enough, we've got anal and cream pie action too! It's too good to be true, but I guess that's why everybody loves Rebeca!
title: I Love Rebeca
